name: ZYX STORY
description:
STORY
Start a new pixel-adventure to destroy the curse .

Go to the wise man's tower, fight enemies and avoid the traps,
who will keep you away from the top of the tower

GAMEPLAY

Start your adventure and survive with your rifle!
it's the only thing you need to go on,useful against enemies and important to solve the puzzle-game sessions with lasers.

Run,Jump,Shoot Projectiles and Lasers to go on in this FUN and DIFFICULT platform/puzzle game
